pages.text: On your travels over hill and dale, you have the opportunity to find numerous plants that appear only to the trained eye.$(br2)The more familiar you are with the magic that comes from the world, the more of them you can glimpse.

pages.title: Quitoxic Reeds
pages.text: An alien-looking variety of sugar cane that grows exclusively in swamps and seems to devour nutrients. A purple glittering powder can be extracted from the stems.

pages.title: Mermaids Brush
pages.text: This inconspicuous plant grows in the deepest depths of the oceans, forever untouched by human influence. On Mermaids Brushes grows a single flower, which slowly develops into a filigree shaped seed. When fully grown, these stones float to the surface of the sea to be carried away by the waves.$(br2)This relic has a strong bond with water.
